en: [wave amp=20 freq=5]{pawn} will follow… Let’s go… {player}…[/wave]
{partner} watches you vacantly for a while. Then she tries to smile.
You try to start a conversation, but {partner} doesn't seem to notice.
{partner} awkwardly looks around, trying to figure out what she should be doing right now.
The fire seems to have captivated {partner}’s attention. She hasn't looked away in a while.
[wave amp=20 freq=5]{player}… The district manager is here…[/wave]
[wave amp=20 freq=5]Go home… Archangel. Your services are… no longer… required.[/wave]
